name: glhe_pro_g_function_import

arguments.name: object
arguments.display_name: Select plant loop to add GLHX to

modeler_description: This import process will removethe existing District Heating and District Cooling objects on the plant loop and replace them with a vertical GLHE that is sized per the inputs in the G Function .idf file that is exported from GLHEPro.
description: After running GLHEPro to size the GLHE and export the G Function .idf file, use this measure to import these GLHE inputs back into the model.  In order to export the loads necessary to size the bore field, see the Reporting measure called 'GLHEPro Export Loads for Ground Heat Exchanger Sizing.'
